column6: Tranquil abode right off of Main Street in Historic Grapevine. Less than a mile from the Farmers Market, Restaurants, antique & specialty shops. You'll enjoy your stay with our comfortable beds, family room furnished with games and a Smart TV, and a kitchen stocked with appliances and a coffee bar. A lush backyard big enough for a soccer game - ball provided.\nOur place is good for couples, business travelers, families (w/ highchair & pack 'n' play), or groups (3 bdrm & 1 air mattress).
column9: Tranquility in Historic Grapevine (Minutes to DFW)
